body.name: A1 2021 Mini HEPA USB-C Powered Air Purifier. Ultra Portable (5.2in tall, 6.7 ounces), Ultra Quiet. for Travel, In-Car and Desktop (White)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 37 mins
features: LIGHTWEIGHT AND USB-C POWERED - It won’t take so much space so you can use it anywhere! Only weighing 136 grams with a height of 5.2 inches, it sits perfectly at your bedside, work desk, by your baby’s crib, or in your car! Perfect as a travel air purifier and as a car air purifier.

AUTHENTIC HEPA AIR FILTRATION - filtering out harmful allergens, pollen, and air pollutants that are around you. Ideal for Bedroom, Home Office and Small Room: 30 mins to breathe fresh in the small room (Coverage area 100 sqft)
ULTRA-QUIET - Running at an ultra-quiet 18dB, you won’t even notice it working efficiently in the background while working at your desk or at your bedside while you're asleep.

EASY TO USE: Using your KIKI is as easy as 1-2-3! Plug it into a standard USB socket using the USB-C cable provided. Then press the ON/OFF button on the top of the unit. Wait for the indicator lights to appear on the top of the unit. Press again to switch the lights off at night, and once more to turn off the unit.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: On the go Lightweight, Ultra Quiet, Easy to use one touch operation has a sleek and compact design and can go wherever you go! Small enough to fit comfortably in your bag or backpack. At your desk Weighing less than 5 oz, it's perfect for when you’re working at your desk or when you’re out and about. By your bedside Whisper quiet with soothing night lights to keep you safe at night whether at home or on your travels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel
reviews.reviewText: I travel to random hotel rooms a LOT and this is perfectly helpful from the time I walk into my hotel for all the time I'm there.It's small and compact, doesn't take a lot of room but it helps with the air quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Loud, but effective
reviews.reviewText: The size of this is about the size of my hand. Similar to the size of a iPhone 12 Pro. It is very compact and small making it very easy to bring from place to place. It is quite loud…not loud enough to disturb sleep or be annoying, honesty unless you are listening for it, it’s easy to forget the noise. My room is pretty big. 13x13 square foot in dimension..after about 15 minutes most of my sinuses clear up and it helps filter the air pretty well. It is also very cheap for the size, definitely get what you pay for. Not perfect, but if you’re looking for a cheap option this one is great! I mostly use it for my bird because she is dusty lol, keep it next to her cage, works like a charm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A lot of noise for such a small machine, easy to use, not sure if it works
reviews.reviewText: The air purifier is great for small spaces & barely takes up any space on a desk or table. My problem is that it's actually kind of loud. I was planning on using it at work, but my office is very quiet & I didn't want to disturb my co-workers so I took it back home. It does make a great white noise machine, but even then I put it far away from my bed so it wouldn't be so loud. I'm not sure how well it actually filters the air since it is so small. The filter came out easy to it would be easy to change when it comes time. Replacement filters were going for about $12.99 on Amazon. There's an option to run it without a light on or to run it with a light that changes colors gradually from yellow to orange, to red, purple, etc. It came with a decently long charging cord. The part that connects to the machine is USB-C & the other end is USB so it can be plugged into a computer or a charging block. When I took it out of the box there was a small rattling noise coming from inside so there is something loose in there which is a little concerning. But the machine turns on & makes noise so I guess it's working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not for a office cubicle
reviews.reviewText: the sound was distracting. not designed for a standard office cubicle. the person on the other side couls hear it, might be good for a larger space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Only worked one night
reviews.reviewText: This product worked for the first night but then would not turn back on. Don't waste your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great in bedroom. Have a biggeron in kitchen really cuts down on smells and give a nice air flow to keep it cooler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I think it’s working
reviews.reviewText: It’s very loud but if it’s actually cleaning the air like it’s supposed to I’d say it’s worth it since it’s more affordable than others !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a small space
reviews.reviewText: KIKI Pure A1 is a mini HEPA filter air cleaning device made for travel ideally. Powered by USB-C which a cable is included, the small size of this purifier makes it easy to discreetly set up in an office, nursery, RV, or anywhere a space needs some air scrubbing. The small space effectiveness of this air purifier is really obvious after about an hour, odors both new or lingering begin to fade away. The device does have a somewhat annoying color change pattern which might be appealing to some (but can be turned off easily) and a wall plug for the USB-C isnt included. The reduced noise level output is minor, and blends in to the background similar to white noise. All together, if you are looking to freshen the air in a small space and dont want to spend a fortune, grab one of these from KIKI Pure.
